TopicTitle: Vertical Take Off Slow Speed Jet

Articles.Content: The Vertical Take Off Slow Speed Jet, VTOSSJ for short can take of vertically, hover, and fly. The controls are 1 for flight, 2 for vertical take off. Here's some advice use half throttle.
Whats the point of vertically lifting off but not landing... and why is the acronym so specific? It's not like a bunch of other people are going to make "VTOSSJ's"
What is the point of you dumping on someone's work?
What is the point of a thread without screenshots or download? I use imgur and mediafire, respectively, for that.
What's the point of life if we're all going to die one day?
What's the point of toilet paper? I mean my butt is just going to get soiled again :I

Baby don't hurt me. No more.

I can see where baarnold is coming from, but I think he just went about it the wrong way, sounded a little offensive... A lot of creations for KSP can be viewed under a lot of different banners, as replicas, something practical, or just something really cool. But without screenshots, I'd have to agree a little with baarnold. Only slightly, only slightly.
What is the point of the universe? Think about it.
This thread had little relevance and somehow has only ended up with less. Thread closed.
